title: Did Flyleaf break up? If so, when and why did they break up? - Quora

response.answer_text: They haven’t officially broken up, but after Lacey’s departure the new vocalist Kristen May had a lot of backlash and criticism for “not being on brand with Flyleaf” or something like that and she dropped out after recording flyleaf’s comeback album “Between the Stars”. They aren’t officially broken up but without a vocalist I doubt they’d be making music any time soon. Lacey has an album out and it’s great (“Life Screams”) and honestly I didn’t think Between was that bad, I particularly liked Sober Serenade and Thread, as well as the demo Tied to the Broken. It’s unfortunate though, because Flyleaf was a great group I literally grew up with.
